Package src.main.java.Function_A

Class Function_A

java.lang.Object
src.main.java.Function_A.Function_A
public class Function_A extends Object
Function_A class is used to perform compute the optimal mix of wines to be produced in the year to maximize the gross profit of the winery

    • Get_Result

      public Result Get_Result()
      Calculates the optimal volume of two wines (RosÃ© and P-Noir), then used them to calculate VCL, Sales Revenue, Gross Profit and Profit Margin.
      Returns:
      A Result object that stores the returns optimal volume of RosÃ©, optimal volume of P-Noir, optimized total gross profits, optimized profit margin

    • roundTwoSigFig

      public static double roundTwoSigFig(double value, int places)
      Parameters:
      value - Optimal Margin that has not been converted to the nearest significant figure
      places - Round to how many significant figure
      Returns:
      The rounded version of optimal margin

      Parameters:

    • Get_Warning_Message

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> Get_Warning_Message(int Opt_Rose, int Opt_Noir)
      Checks whether the optimal solution of the volume of RosÃ© and P-Noir will lead to abnormal situation and produces warning messages for abnormal situations.
      Parameters:
      Opt_Rose -
      Opt_Noir -
      Returns:
      A list of warning messages caused by the optimal solution. The list will be empty if there is no abnormal situation happened.

    • Data_Validation

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> Data_Validation(String[] input)
      Validates the data input
      Parameters:
      input - Contains Number of weeks, Capacity of Labor, Capacity of Grape, Price of RosÃ©, Price of P-Noir, Fixed Costs (in ascending order)
      Returns:
      Generate error message(s) caused by invalid inputs. The list will be empty if all the inputs are valid.
